resources.string: Based on the \"Animal Crossing Music\" browser extension:\nhttps://github.com/JdotCarver/Animal-Crossing-Music-Extension#
Uses ripped music from Animal Crossing that was distributed alongside the \"Nook\" browser extension:\nhttps://github.com/matlsn/nook/tree/master/src
\"Animal Crossing\" and ripped music assets from that game are property of Nintendo and composed by Kazumi Totaka.
Find a bug? Have a question? Email sol@foxie.moe!
